current_offers.short_description: 2 and 6 month extras waits waived plus a gift card
current_offers.terms:
All two month waiting periods and the optical six month waiting periods are waived.

  • Singles policies get a $100 gift card
  • Couples and family policies get a $200 gift card
  • Limit one gift card per membership
  • Cards will be issued after the policy holder has held cover for at least 30 days
  • Cards will take 6-8 weeks after the date of joining to be delivered
  • Offer available to new members, being those who have not previously held Australian Unity health cover, and who purchase hospital and extras cover from Australian Unity between 18 September and 30 November 2017
  • Does not apply to Hospital only or Extras only covers
  • Not available with Overseas Visitors Cover
  • This offer is made and executed by Australian Unity.

• For new members/memberships.
  • This offer does not apply to current Frank members.
  • Members must pay via direct debit.
  • Members must pay their first month.
  • This offer is made and executed by Frank.

• For new members/memberships.
  • This offer does not apply to current GMHBA members.
  • Members must pay via direct debit.
  • Members must pay their first month.
  • Bronze products are included in this offer.
  • This offer is made and executed by GMHBA.

current_offers.short_description: Join Peoplecare on hospital cover or combined cover and Peoplecare will give you a $100 gift card
current_offers.terms:
• This offer is for new members only who purchase a hospital only or hospital and extras cover.
  • Members who purchase Extras or Ambulance only covers are not eligible for the Gift Card.
  • This offer is current as at 1 September 2016, and can be altered or withdrawn at any time. Peoplecare reserves the right to change the offer conditions at any time without notice.
  • This offer is applied to purchases by new members either through the Peoplecare website/call centre or Members Own Health Funds. It is not available through any other intermediary.
  • This offer is not available with any other promotional offers being run by Peoplecare at the same time.
  • All Gift Cards will be delivered by post to the address nominated by the member. Peoplecare are not liable for any damaged, undelivered, lost or stolen Gift Cards and no replacement gift cards will be provided in the event of damage to, non-delivery of, or theft of a Gift Card. Allow 8-9 weeks after the purchase date of the new policy for delivery of the Gift Card.
  • Gift cards are subject to the terms and conditions of the gift card issuer. These conditions can be viewed at https://rewardscometrue.com.au/.
  • This offer is made and executed by Peoplecare.

current_offers.short_description: 6 weeks free OR 1 month free and 2 & 6 month waits on extras waived
current_offers.terms:
New member offer – Six weeks free OR One month free plus 2 and 6 month waits waived

  1. Offer commences 12.00am, Monday 4 September 2017 and closes 11.59pm (AEDT), Sunday 8 October 2017, and may be extended.
  2. This offer is only available to new members who satisfy the eligibility criteria of Teachers Health, whose membership application is received by Teachers Health from 4 September 2017 and closes 11.59pm (AEDT), 8 October 2017.
  3. The new member must select Hospital and Extras cover, or a combined cover, in order to be eligible to receive this offer.
  4. The new member must provide the promotion code "ONE" when joining online, over the phone or with a Business Development officer.
  5. The new member must select a Direct Debit payment plan.
  6. One (1) month's free cover is applied to the second month of the new membership, upon successful receipt of the new member’s first contribution payment.
  7. Only the two and six month waiting periods on Extras services will be waived for new members, as part of this promotion.
  8. The offer does not apply to stand-alone Hospital, Extras or Ambulance only policies.
  9. The offer does not apply to policy upgrades, or when a spouse or dependant is added to an existing Teachers Health policy.
  10. This offer is only available to a new Teachers Health policyholder who has not been a paying/financial member of Teachers Health or UniHealth in the past four (4) months.
  11. The offer is not available to new members who have received an incentive offer from Teachers Health or UniHealth within the last 12 months.
  12. Terms and conditions are subject to change without notice.

This offer is made and executed by Teachers Health.

If you have further questions regarding these terms and conditions, please contact Teachers Health.

current_offers.short_description: 1 month free and 2 & 6 month waits on extras waived
current_offers.terms:
New member offer – One month free plus 2 & 6 month waiting periods waived on Extras

  1. Offer commences 12.00am, Friday 1 September 2017 and closes 11.59pm (AEDT), Saturday 30 September 2017, and may be extended.
  2. This offer is only available to new members who satisfy the eligibility criteria of Nurses & Midwives Health, whose membership application is received by Nurses & Midwives Health from 1 September 2017 and closes 11.59pm (AEDT), 30 September 2017.
  3. The new member must select Hospital and Extras cover, or a combined cover, in order to be eligible to receive this offer.
  4. The new member must provide the promotion code "ONE" when joining online, over the phone or with a Business Development officer.
  5. The new member must select a Direct Debit payment plan.
  6. One (1) month's free cover is applied to the second month of the new membership, upon successful receipt of the new member’s first contribution payment.
  7. Only the two and six month waiting periods on Extras services will be waived for new members, as part of this promotion.
  8. The offer does not apply to stand-alone Hospital, Extras or Ambulance only policies.
  9. The offer does not apply to policy upgrades, or when a spouse or dependant is added to an existing Nurses & Midwives Health policy.
  10. This offer is only available to a new UniHealth policyholder who has not been a paying/financial member of Nurses & Midwives Health in the past four (4) months.
  11. The offer is not available to new members who have received an incentive offer from Nurses & Midwives Health within the last 12 months.
  12. Terms and conditions are subject to change without notice.

This offer is made and executed by Nurses & Midwives Health.

If you have further questions regarding these terms and conditions, please contact Nurses & Midwives Health.

• Available only for new members
  • Gift card will be sent out after policy have been financial for 30 days

This offer is made and executed by Health Partners.
